channel.title: Beers on Introducing Luppoleto Brewing Company
channel.description: Recent content in Beers on Introducing Luppoleto Brewing Company

item.title: Stouty McStoutface
item.description:
Ahh the beloved research vessel whose name rose so clearly to the top like the creamy foam atop this beer.Is this a shameless attempt to profit of a popular meme? Maybe. But who could stay mad at that face?

“Well isn’t that just blacker than the ace of spades!” - My Neighbor, Peering into the homebrew kettle

See what we did here was make a nice English Style Export Stout (a bit sweeter than its continental cousin) and added a bunch of cold-brewed coffee – think chocolate covered espresso beans.

Yeah. It’s prettty good.
